addPairToProtocol(address,address,addres.details: Adds the pool address to the accepted pool addresses, maps the token addresses to their corresponding WETH pool information, and emits events for each added token.

params._ETHpoolToken0: The address of the WETH pool for the first token.
params._ETHpoolToken1: The address of the WETH pool for the second token.
params._inv0: Whether the first token's price is inversed in the WETH pool.
params._inv1: Whether the second token's price is inversed in the WETH pool.
params._poolAddress: The address of the pool to add to the protocol.
params._token0: The address of the first token in the pair.
params._token1: The address of the second token in the pair.

batchliquidate(uint256[],uint256[]).details: Given that the callers have enough GHO to reimburse the positions' debt, the positions are liquidated, the GHO is burned and the NFTs are transfered to the callers.

params._GHOToRepays: The amounts of GHO to repay to reimburse the debt of the positions.
params._tokenIds: The IDs of the positions to liquidate.

changePositionStatus(uint256,uint8).details: The position must have a different status than the one provided.

params._status: The new status of the position.
params._tokenId: The token ID of the position.
The ID of the position to get the collateral ratio of.

returns._0: collRatio The collateral ratio of the position.

debtOf(uint256).details: The debt is calculated using the interest rate and the last update timestamp of the position.

params._tokenId: The ID of the position to get the debt of.

returns.currentDebt: The total debt of the position, including interest.

debtOfInETH(uint256).details: The debt is calculated using the price of the token in ETH.

params._tokenId: The ID of the position to get the debt of.

returns._0: debtInETH The debt of the position in ETH.

decreaseDebtOf(uint256,uint256).details: The debt is decreased by the given amount, and the last update timestamp is set to the current block timestamp.

params._amount: The amount to decrease the debt of the position by.
params._tokenId: The ID of the position to decrease the debt of.
The token to retrieve the position for

returns.position: The position of the given token

returns._0: totalCount The number of positions owned by all users.

getRiskConstants(address).details: The risk constants are the minimum collateral ratio of the pool.

params._pool: The address of the pool to get the risk constants of.

returns.riskConstants: The risk constants ratio of the pool.

increaseDebtOf(uint256,uint256).details: The debt is increased by the given amount, and the last update timestamp is set to the current block timestamp.

params._amount: The amount to increase the debt of the position by.
params._tokenId: The ID of the position to increase the debt of.

liquidatable(uint256).details: A position is liquidatable if its collateral ration is less than the minimum collateral ratio of the pool it is in.

params._tokenId: The ID of the position to check.

returns._0: isLiquidatable, true if the position is liquidatable and false otherwise.

liquidatePosition(uint256,uint256).details: Given that the caller has enough GHO to reimburse the position's debt, the position is liquidated, the GHO is burned and the NFT is transfered to the caller.

params._GHOToRepay: The amount of GHO to repay to reimburse the debt of the position.
params._tokenId: The ID of the position to liquidate.

returns._0: hasBeenLiquidated, true if the position has been liquidated and false otherwise.

liquidateUnderlyings(uint256,uint256).details: Given that the caller has enough GHO to reimburse the position's debt, the position is liquidated, the GHO is burned and the NFT is transfered to the caller.

params._GHOToRepay: The amount of GHO to repay to reimburse the debt of the position.
params._tokenId: The ID of the position to liquidate.

returns.hasBeenLiquidated: true if the position has been liquidated and false otherwise.

openPosition(address,uint256).details: The position is added to the array of positions owned by the owner, and the position is added to the array of all positions.

params._owner: The address of the position owner.
params._tokenId: The ID of the Uniswap NFT representing the position.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

positionAmounts(uint256).details: The amounts of tokens are calculated using the UniswapV3 TWAP Oracle mechanism.

params._tokenId: The token ID to retrieve the amounts for.

positionValueInETH(uint256).details: The value is calculated using the price of the tokens in ETH.

params._tokenId: The ID of the position to get the value of.

returns.value: The value of the position in ETH.

priceInETH(address).details: The value is calculated using the TWAP on the TOKEN/ETH's pool.

returns._0: valueInETH The value of the token in ETH.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setAddresses(address,address,address).details: This function can only be called by the contract owner.

params._GHOTokenAddress: The address of the Gho token contract.
params._activePoolAddress: The address of the active pool contract.
params._borrowerOperationsAddress: The address of the borrower operations contract.

params._liquidity: The new liquidity of the position.
params._tokenId: The ID of the position to set the liquidity of.

params._lastUpdate: The last update of the position.
params._poolAddress: The address of the pool of the position.

totalDebtOf(address).details: The debt is calculated using the interest rate and the last update timestamp of the position.

params._user: The address of the user to get the debt of.

returns.totalDebtInGHO: The total debt of the user, including interest.

totalPositionsValueInETH(address).details: The value is calculated using the price of the tokens in ETH.

params._user: The address of the user to get the total value of.

returns.totalValue: The total value of all active positions of the user in ETH.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateRiskConstants(address,uint256).details: The risk constants are the minimum collateral ratio of the pool.

params._pool: The address of the pool to update the risk constants of.
params._riskConstants: The new risk constants ratio of the pool.

addPairToProtocol(address,address,addres.notice: Adds a pair of tokens to the protocol.

changePositionStatus(uint256,uint8).notice: Changes the status of a position with a given token ID.

computeCR(uint256).notice: Returns the collateral ratio of a position.

debtOf(uint256).notice: Returns the total debt of a position, including interest.

debtOfInETH(uint256).notice: Returns the debt of a position in ETH.

decreaseDebtOf(uint256,uint256).notice: Decreases the debt of a position by a given amount.

getPosition(uint256).notice: Retrieves the position of a given token

getPositionsCount().notice: Returns the total number of positions owned by all users.

getRiskConstants(address).notice: Returns the risk constants of a pool.

increaseDebtOf(uint256,uint256).notice: Increases the debt of a position by a given amount.

liquidatable(uint256).notice: Checks if a position is liquidatable.

liquidateUnderlyings(uint256,uint256).notice: Liquidates a position and its underlyings.

openPosition(address,uint256).notice: Opens a new position for the given token ID and owner.

positionAmounts(uint256).notice: Returns the amount of tokens 0 and 1 of a position.

positionValueInETH(uint256).notice: Returns the value of a position in ETH.

priceInETH(address).notice: Returns the value of a token in ETH.

setAddresses(address,address,address).notice: Set the addresses of various contracts and emit events to indicate that these addresses have been modified.

setNewLiquidity(uint256,uint128).notice: Sets the liquidity of a position.

setNewPosition(address,address,uint256,u.notice: Add a new position to the list of positions.

totalDebtOf(address).notice: Returns the total debt of a user, including interest.

totalPositionsValueInETH(address).notice: Returns the total value of all active positions of a user in ETH.

updateRiskConstants(address,uint256).notice: Updates the risk constants of a pool.
